patterns: How long does delivery take?
When will my order arrive?
Can I return an item?
What's your return policy?
i want to return my order
responses: You can return items within 3 days for a full refund. Please check our return policy page for more details.

patterns: Which payment methods do you accept?
Are credit cards the only payment option?
responses: We accept cash, credit cards, and PayPal. You can find the full list of accepted payment methods at checkout.

patterns: How do I create an account?
Is an account necessary to make a purchase?
responses: You can create an account during the checkout process. An account is not mandatory, but it allows for order tracking and faster checkouts.

patterns: How can I contact customer support?
Is there a phone number to reach you?
responses: You can reach our customer support team via email. Additionally, you can find our phone number on the 'Contact Us' page.

patterns: Do you offer [specific product/service]?
What types of products do you sell?
responses: Yes, we offer [Specific Product/Service]. Our range includes [Product Categories]. You can explore more on our website.

patterns: How much does shipping cost?
Is shipping free?
responses: Shipping costs vary based on location and order size. Orders above 700 LE qualify for free shipping.

patterns: Can I cancel my order?
What is your order cancellation policy?
i want to cancel my order
responses: Orders can be canceled within 24 hours from the order placement. Please check your order confirmation email for cancellation instructions.

patterns: Is [Product Name] in stock?
When will [Product Name] be available?
responses: I'm sorry, [Product Name] is currently out of stock. Please check back later for availability or consider similar alternatives.

patterns: How secure is my personal information?
Do you share customer data with third parties?
responses: We prioritize customer privacy and employ stringent security measures. Your information is not shared with third parties without consent. For details, check our privacy policy.
I'm sorry, I didn't quite catch that. Could you please rephrase or ask in a different way?

patterns: Can I exchange an item?
What is your exchange policy?
responses: We offer exchanges within 2 days for items in their original condition. You can find detailed instructions on our exchange policy page.

patterns: What are your customer service hours?
When can I reach your support team?
responses: Our customer service team is available from Sunday to Thursday 8:00 AM : 8:00 PM.

patterns: Can I modify my order after placing it?
Is it possible to change my order?
responses: Unfortunately, orders cannot be modified once they are placed. You can cancel the order and make another order.
